::Cygnar::
    "Excuse me sir.  I was thinking about the plan and since we'll be 
sneaking in from the back all they have to do is send some of their troops 
out the front and around.  If they do that we end up trapped between two 
groups of enemies as strong as we are.  I don't think the plan will work 
without significant losses.  Don't misunderstand me I'm not questioning 
anyone's willingness to lay down their life for this cause, but the more bots 
you lose the fewer there are to fight the next battle."
